title: madhukara vrtti
sahitya:
madhukara vrtti ennadu adu balu cennadu


anupallavi

  padumanAbhana pAda paduma madhupavemba


caraNam 1    kAlige gejje kaTTi nIla varNana guNa AsApisutta balu olaga mADuvantha
    caraNam 2    ranganAthana guNa hingade pADutta shrngAra nODutta kangaLAnandavemba
    caraNam 3    indirApati purandara viTTalanalli cendada bhaktiyindAnandava paDuvantha
